title: Convert homepage to navigation-based layout with separate section views

requirements.text: Refactor frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx to display a navigation menu or list of section links/buttons instead of rendering all donor sections inline on the homepage

quotes: make the home has sections sfter clicking the section then only i need to acces the section details

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays clickable section links or buttons for: Total Donor List, Blood Requirement, Appointed Donors, Temporary Rejected Donors, and Permanent Rejected Donors
No donor tables or section details are visible on the initial homepage load
Each section link is clearly labeled and styled consistently with the medical theme

requirements.text: Implement section navigation state management in HomePage.tsx that tracks which section is currently active and displays only that section's content when clicked

quotes: aafter i clicked the section then only i want see the details in the section

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a section link/button reveals that section's full content (donors table, forms, etc.)
Only one section's details are visible at a time
User can navigate back to the section menu or switch between sections without page reload

requirements.text: Add a back or home button that returns the user from a section detail view to the main section navigation menu
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly visible back/home button is present when viewing any section detail
Clicking the button returns to the section navigation menu
The navigation state resets so no section details are visible after returning

requirements.text: Preserve the Add Donor functionality and make it accessible from either the section navigation menu or the Total Donor List section view
acceptanceCriteria: Add Donor button remains functional and accessible
AddDonorDialog continues to work as currently implemented
After adding a donor, user can see the updated list in the Total Donor List section

constraints: Do not modify backend logic or data structures
Preserve all existing donor management functionality (add, edit, delete, call tracking)
Maintain the medical-themed design and color palette
Keep all existing components (DonorTable, AppointedDonorsList, TempRejectedDonorsList, PermanentRejectedDonorsList, BloodRequirementForm) functional
nonGoals: Creating a multi-page application with routing
Adding new donor fields or backend functions
Modifying authentication or Internet Identity logic
Changing the existing sorting or call tracking behavior
